flawed_nl_solution:
Originally, the houses are 7300+5200=<<7300+5200=12500>>12500 sq. ft. in total.
The smaller house will be expanded by 16000-12500=<<16000-12500=3050>>3050 sq. ft.
#### 3050

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3500, not 3050. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
